alert.note: Alert for Brazos; Burleson; Grimes (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 11 at 2:37PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Burleson, northern Grimes and central Brazos Counties through 315 PM CST... At 237 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Caldwell, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... College Station, Bryan, Caldwell, Snook, Bedias, Millican, Anderson, Kyle Field, Iola, Wellborn, Roans Prairie and Carlos. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
